main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: Hi, I'm Bibek, an enthusiastic web developer with an interest in UX/UI design. After spending 7+ years in the commercial side of websites & apps, I decided to trust my instinct and pursue a career in development. My passion for design and development now has evolved into a brand-new career and an exciting adventure. In during my learning journey, I have proved myself to be a committed learner. The ability to constantly be learning and developing new skills is an important factor in my passion. P.S. I love almost anything under the sun, apart from Real Madrid and slow wifi.
main.contactmessage: If you're interested in chatting or want more information about what I've been working on, I'd love to hear from you!

education.description: Programing Fundamentals, Product Development, Front-end Web Development, Back-End Web Development and Team Collaboration Strategies

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Built and maintained various web projects utilizing various tech stacks including Ruby on Rails, Javascript, jQuery, Python, HTML5, CSS3. Also, consulted managed cloud(focus on server latency), digital marketing and UaaS services.
work.description2: Built Oinker - Date planning application aggreates data from multiple restaurant and event ticketing APIs and allows users to plan an event based on budget.

work.title: Enterprise Key Account Manager
work.description: Inspiretec specializes in building custom web applications for companies in loyalty & travel industry. My role focused on scoping new web & applications projects($1+ million projects) within assigned enterprise accounts. Responsible for the day-to-day relationship of accounts and relay change requests, SoW(statement of work) to development teams and project managers.

work.title: Cloud Consultant/ Sales Manager
work.description: Focus on consulting managed cloud services, CDN and hosting to various dev shops in North America. Ecritel was a direct competion to AWS and Rackspace - with value prop of fastest cloud in Canada with global infrasctructure. Also, reperesented company at various trade shows in North America.

projects.title: Pokemon GIPHY generator
projects.category: Rails -Combines two API calls to generate Pokemon Gifs
